title: Mike Minnick, Friendversation
itunes:title: Mike Minnick, Friendversation
description:
I am pleased to bring you another installment of the monthly "friendversation" series that will happen throughout 2016. This time I call up my friend Mike Minnick who you may know from Curl Up and Die, Puig Destroyer and his recent project, Less Art (which I forget in the intro like the true professional I am). We discuss the importance of live music, writing lyrics and a bunch of other stuff. Sit back, relax and enjoy. -- This weeks show is brought to you by Adam & Eve want to make your Valentines Day spectacular. Use the code WORDS for 50% off 1 item, free shipping and more!Use ourAmazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
